H3.text: when did celtics win the championship. 1969 NBA Finals

A4.text: The heavily favored Celtics defeated the Rockets four games to two to win their then-record 16th NBA championship.

A5.text: The Celtics entered a rare and unusual slump for the next two decades, and would not win the championship again until 2008.
